com.viaoa.hub
Class HubPropController

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.hub.HubPropController
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnabledController, VisibleController
public abstract class HubPropController
extends java.lang.Object

Base class that uses one or more Hub, Property, and compare value to update another component.

Author:
vincevia

Method Detail

add

public void add(Hub hub)
Add an addition hub to base the check on. Since there is no propertyName, then it will be based on AO.

add

public void add(Hub hub,
                java.lang.String propertyPath)
If compare value is null: if propertyPath is null then uses OANotNullObject, else uses Boolean.true

Parameters:
hub -
propertyPath -

add

public void add(Hub hub,
                java.lang.String propertyPath,
                java.lang.Object compareValue)
Add an addition hub/property to base the check on.

Parameters:
compareValue - can be null, OANullObject.instance, OANotNullObject.instance, OAAnyValueObject.instance, or any other value. Note: OAAnyValueObject is used so that hub.isValid is the only check that is needed.

clear

public void clear()

close

public void close()

isValid

public boolean isValid()
Called after by update during a change that affects any of the hub/properties. This can be overwritten to customize the value.

Returns:

_isValid

protected boolean _isValid()

isValid

protected boolean isValid(boolean bEnableValue)
This is called with the Enabled value, as a chance to overwrite the value.

update

public void update()

directlySet

public void directlySet(boolean b,
                        boolean bEnableValue)
This allows to set the enabled directly, and not use the Hub/propertie (isValid() method).

onUpdate

protected abstract void onUpdate(boolean bValid)
